main event: Two low flying cigar-shaped objects were sighted over the Iran-Loftabad border area.
interesting points: One object came from the direction of Russia-Afghanistan, flew over the border area, and then returned in the same direction.
The second object also came from the Russia-Afghanistan direction but continued flying northward.
The objects were witnessed by the border commander, who noted they were wingless and had no visible pilots.
The objects remained intact for 3 hours before gradually expanding in a pattern or contrail.
The report comments that there is no new construction in the area.
